sidebar.updateDescription: Een nieuwe versie van KristWeb is beschikbaar. Herlaad alstublieft.

contextualAddressNonExistentTooltip: Dit adres is nog niet geinitialiseerd op het Krist netwerk.

masterPassword.intro2: Voer een <1>hoofdwachtwoord</1> in om je wallet-sleutels te beschermen. Deze worden in je browser opgeslagen, en je dient je hoofdwachtwoord elke sessie opnieuw in te voeren.
masterPassword.errorPasswordLength: Moet op zijn minst 1 karakter bevatten.
masterPassword.popoverDescription: Voer je hoofdwachtwoord in om je wallets te ontsleutelen.
masterPassword.popoverDescriptionEncrypt: Voer je hoofdwachtwoord in om je wallets te versleutelen en te ontsleutelen.
masterPassword.forcedAuthWarning: Je bent automatisch ingelogd door een onveilige debug-instelling.

myWallets.title: Wallets
myWallets.actionsDeleteConfirm: Weet je zeker dat je deze wallet wil verwijderen?
myWallets.actionsDeleteConfirmDescription: Als je het wallet-sleutel niet hebt opgeslagen of opgeschreven, is deze voor altijd verloren!

status: KristWeb 2 is still in development. If you are not a donor, then you should not be here. Do not host this website.

addWallet.walletPasswordWarning: Zorg dat je dit ergens <1>veilig</1> bewaard!
addWallet.walletSave: Sla deze wallet op in KristWeb
addWallet.errorUnexpectedDescription: Er is een fout opgetreden bij het toevoegen van de wallet. Zie de console voor details.
addWallet.errorUnexpectedEditDescription: Er is een fout opgetreden bij het bewerken van de wallet. Zie console voor details.
addWallet.errorDuplicateWalletDescription: U heeft al een wallet voor dat adres.
addWallet.errorMissingWalletDescription: De wallet die u probeert te bewerken, bestaat niet meer.
addWallet.errorDecryptDescription: Ontsleutelen van het wallet-wachtwoord is mislukt. Is het hoofdwachtwoord correct?
addWallet.errorWalletLimitDescription: U kunt momenteel geen wallets meer toevoegen.

dashboard.inDevBanner: Welcome to the KristWeb v2 private beta! This site is still in development, so most features are currently missing. Please report all bugs on <1>GitHub</1>. Thanks!
dashboard.transactionsError: Er was een fout bij het ophalen van de transacties. Zie de console voor details.
dashboard.blockValueEmptyDescription: The block value increases when <1>names</1> are purchased.
dashboard.blockDifficultyError: There was an error fetching the block difficulty. See the console for details.
dashboard.blockDifficultyHashRateTooltip: Estimated combined network mining hash rate, based on the current work.
dashboard.motdDebugMode: This sync node is an unofficial development server. Balances and transactions can be manipulated. Proceed with caution.

credits.title: Credits
credits.supportersDescription: This project was made possible by the following amazing supporters:
credits.translatorsDescription: This project was translated by the following amazing contributors:

settings.title: Settings
settings.autoRefreshTablesDescription: Whether or not large table listings (e.g. transactions, names) should automatically refresh when a change is detected on the network.
settings.alwaysIncludeMined: Always include mined transactions in transaction listings (may require refresh)
settings.addressCopyButtons: Show copy buttons next to all addresses
settings.nameCopyButtons: Show copy buttons next to all names
settings.blockHashCopyButtons: Show copy buttons next to all block hashes
settings.showRelativeDates: Show relative dates instead of absolute ones if recent
settings.showRelativeDatesDescription: Everywhere on the site, if a date is less than 7 days ago, it will show as a relative date instead.
settings.transactionDefaultRaw: Default to the 'Raw' tab instead of 'CommonMeta' on the transaction page
settings.defaultPageSize: Default page size for table listings

translations.errorMissingLanguages: The languages.json file seems to be missing. Was KristWeb compiled correctly?

ws.errorToken: There was an error connecting to the Krist websocket server.
ws.errorWS: There was an error connecting to the Krist websocket server (code <1>{{code}}</1>).

rateLimitDescription: Too many requests were sent to the Krist server in a short period of time. This is probably caused by a bug!

address.title: Adres
address.transactionsError: There was an error fetching the transactions. See the console for details.
address.namesError: There was an error fetching the names. See the console for details.
address.resultInvalid: Dat lijkt niet op een correct krist adres.
address.resultNotFound: Dat adres is nog niet geinitialiseerd op het Krist netwerk

transactions.title: Netwerktransacties
transactions.resultInvalid: Dat lijkt niet op een correct krist adres.

names.resultInvalid: Dat lijkt niet op een correct krist adres.

name.title: Naam
name.transactionsError: Er is een fout opgetreden bij het ophalen van transacties. Zie de console voor details.
name.historyError: Er is een fout opgetreden bij het ophalen van de naamgeschiedenis. Zie de console voor details.
name.resultInvalid: Dit lijkt niet op een correct krist adres.

block.title: Blok
block.resultInvalid: That does not look like a valid block height.

transaction.title: Transaction
transaction.name: Naam
transaction.commonMetaParsedHelp: These values were not directly contained in the transaction metadata, but they were inferred by the CommonMeta parser.
transaction.commonMetaCustomHelp: These values were directly contained in the transaction metadata.
transaction.cardRawDataHelp: The transaction exactly as it was returned by the Krist API.
transaction.resultInvalid: That does not look like a valid transaction ID.

noWalletsResult.title: No wallets yet
noWalletsResult.subTitle: You currently have no wallets saved in KristWeb, so there is nothing to see here yet. Would you like to add a wallet?

import.description: Paste the backup code (or import from a file below) and enter the corresponding master password. Backups from KristWeb v1 are also supported.
import.appMasterPasswordRequired: You must be authenticated to import wallets.
import.fileErrorNotText: The imported file must be a text file.
import.overwriteCheckboxLabel: Update existing wallet labels if there are conflicts

decodeErrors.atob: The backup could not be decoded as it is not valid base64!
decodeErrors.json: The backup could not be decoded as it is not valid JSON!
decodeErrors.missingTester: The backup could not be decoded as it is missing a tester key!
decodeErrors.missingSalt: The backup could not be decoded as it is missing a salt key!
decodeErrors.invalidTester: The backup could not be decoded as the 'tester' key is the wrong type!
decodeErrors.invalidSalt: The backup could not be decoded as the 'salt' key is the wrong type!
decodeErrors.invalidWallets: The backup could not be decoded as the 'wallets' key is the wrong type!
decodeErrors.invalidFriends: The backup could not be decoded as the 'wallets' key is the wrong type!
decodeErrors.unknown: The backup could not be decoded due to an unknown error. See console for details.

walletMessages.successSkipped: A wallet with the same address ({{address}}) and settings already exists, so it was skipped.
walletMessages.successUpdated: A wallet with the same address ({{address}}) already exists. Its label was updated to "{{label}}"
walletMessages.successSkippedNoOverwrite: A wallet with the same address ({{address}}) already exists, and you chose not to overwrite the label, so it was skipped.
walletMessages.successImportSkipped: A wallet with the same address ({{address}}) was already imported, so it was skipped.
walletMessages.warningSyncNode: This wallet had a custom sync node, which is not supported in KristWeb v2. The sync node was skipped.
walletMessages.warningIcon: This wallet had a custom icon, which is not supported in KristWeb v2. The icon was skipped.
walletMessages.warningLabelInvalid: The label for this wallet was invalid. The label was skipped.
walletMessages.warningCategoryInvalid: The category for this wallet was invalid. The category was skipped.
walletMessages.warningAdvancedFormat: This wallet uses an advanced format ({{format}}), which has limited support in KristWeb v2.
walletMessages.errorInvalidTypeString: This wallet was not a string!
walletMessages.errorInvalidTypeObject: This wallet was not an object!
walletMessages.errorDecrypt: This wallet could not be decrypted!
walletMessages.errorPasswordDecrypt: The password for this wallet could not be decrypted!
walletMessages.errorWalletJSON: The decrypted data was not valid JSON!
walletMessages.errorUnknownFormat: This wallet uses an unknown or unsupported format!
walletMessages.errorFormatMissing: This wallet is missing a format!
walletMessages.errorUsernameMissing: This wallet is missing a username!
walletMessages.errorPasswordMissing: This wallet is missing a password!
walletMessages.errorPrivateKeyMissing: This wallet is missing a private key!
walletMessages.errorMasterKeyMissing: This wallet is missing a master key!
walletMessages.errorPrivateKeyMismatch: This wallet's password did not map to its stored private key!
walletMessages.errorMasterKeyMismatch: This wallet's password did not map to its stored master key!
walletMessages.errorLimitReached: You reached the wallet limit. You currently cannot add any more wallets.
walletMessages.errorUnknown: An unknown error occurred. See console for details.

friendMessages.errorNYI: The Address Book has not yet been implemented, so it was skipped.

results.warnings: There was <1>{{count, number}} warning</1> while importing your backup.
results.warnings_plural: There were <1>{{count, number}} warning</1> while importing your backup.
results.errors: There was <1>{{count, number}} error</1> while importing your backup.
results.errors_plural: There were <1>{{count, number}} errors</1> while importing your backup.
results.errorsAndWarnings: There were <1>{{errors, number}} error(s)</1> and <3>{{warnings, number}} warning(s)</3> while importing your backup.

walletLimitMessage: You have more wallets stored than KristWeb supports. This was either caused by a bug, or you bypassed it intentionally. Expect issues with syncing.

addressPicker.placeholder: Type an address, or choose a wallet
addressPicker.errorInvalidRecipient: Invalid recipient. Must be an address or name.
